properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 2:22PM PST until January 18 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...4 to 6 ft through this evening, then
building to 12 to 15 ft late tonight and Saturday.

- SECOND EBB...Around 1115 AM Saturday. Seas to 13 ft with
breakers likely.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...From 8 AM to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
